website_summaries.verdict: Offers a great, distortion-free sound, and the included mounting fixtures take a lot of the guesswork out of installation.
pros: Comes with a variety of mounting fixtures
Easy installation over a wide range of vehicles
Clear sound, with no distortion or harshness
cons: The crossovers are fairly large here, which can affect installation in tight spaces
Some find the highs to be a little too sharp

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounding component tweeter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add some brightness and lift the sound from the door mounted speakers in my truck. They have several clever methods for mounting them to most of the typical locations in a car/truck. They sound good, a touch bright and harsh( I'm a soft dome fella!) but with some tuning they do the trick. They're small and unbtrusive and that's what I was looking for. Classic JBL build quality was also expected and evident. Thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: mark lohnes

customer_reviews.title: For 2004 Z4
customer_reviews.text: WOW...!!! And I really mean that - I installed a media bridge a couple of years ago, and that was amazing, these little tweeters are equally amazing - music is new again. Hearing things I never heard before. Best sound upgrade ever for about $35. Mounted inside one of the provided surface mount cups, they fit tight inside the original opening; only they do not "snap" in. 6 to 8 small spots of silicone, and they hold like a rock. Just spot them like the original speakers were done, and they really hold in there, with no modification - well, other than splicing the wiring. Did I already say WOW?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase for less than 50 bucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very excellent tweeters for 40 bucks. They are a little brighter than I would prefer, but I can turn down the treble. They are very clear with no distortion. I can hear things that I couldn't with my stock tweeters in my 2015 Nissan Altima SV six speaker non bose stock system.
customer_reviews.author: Cubae

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Used as a replacement for my factory sonys in my 2012 F150 platinum. Has to open holes slightly but they fit nice and add a massive improvement in sound.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Cant say enough about these tweeters Put them in a 2012 ford f150 Wow so much better Super clean and loud
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match for me
customer_reviews.text: I put these along with 4 5x7 JBL GTO speakers in a 14 F150 with a Kenwood headunit. The sound is great; not too bright, not too low. They really make the soundstage without you noticing they're there. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: oldschool

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speaker at budget price
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are a very nice , affordable upgrade for my Acura. They sound sooo much better than the stock speakers. The installation Instructions could be better, clearer in term of what to use since you have several options. Still, highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vittoria

customer_reviews.title: I have these installed. I won't say they are the best
customer_reviews.text: I could barely pick up if these tweeters are working or not. But they make my truck look classy since I have two new tweeters. So I like.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: i liked the easiness of installation and the sound quality, added a nice decent crisp to the sound in my JKU
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound!! They really compliment my 4 other ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound!! They really compliment my 4 other JBL GTO Premiums speakers. Made a huge difference in the sound in my 2012 Tacoma.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Everything good.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works good. Installed on F150 2013 front pillars, with some slight modifications on the pillars to make them fit.
customer_reviews.author: Cristinel Patrasc

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Love these little things. Crisp and clear. Replaced the factory tweeters with these and wow, what a difference.
customer_reviews.author: White Trash

customer_reviews.title: I have them hooked up to kenwood 4 channel amp with a separate passive crossover and they sound great. I love the mounting options its very easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Loud and clear. I have them hooked up to kenwood 4 channel amp with a separate passive crossover and they sound great. I love the mounting options its very easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Eric offermann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install in my 2007 Pilot
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly. Easy to install in my 2007 Pilot. Did not have to make any adaptations. They sound much better than the old stock tweeters.
customer_reviews.author: John W Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great price excellent sound..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Nice and clean and clear. Small butt big sound ..I replaced Kappa tweeters.
customer_reviews.author: elgin

customer_reviews.title: Won't Buy Again.
customer_reviews.text: Won't Buy these again. I bought 3 sets of them for my car and they all blew out with in 6 months or so. These don't like to be amplified at all even with a 150RMS 2 channel Rockford amp. They were only receiving 25 watts RMS each and they say on the back of each 35RMS. Under powered and still blew. Waste of money! Buy Rockford speakers, amps, tweeters or go home.
customer_reviews.author: Levizbest

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement tweeters
customer_reviews.text: These are great speakers, very pleasant sounding. I upgraded the stock speakers that came with my car and it's a night and day difference.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for defective tweeter.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a defective tweeter on my surround sound center speaker. Easy to install and easy on my ears.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: If you are not happy with the highs in your vehicle, then I suggest you get these! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GTO TWEETS ARE SWEET SOUNDING. Great sound
customer_reviews.text: GTO TWEETS ARE SWEET SOUNDING. Great sound. Clear highs. Fit great in the headliner of my 2014 ram 1500
customer_reviews.author: FMH

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive tweeters
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive tweeters. My factory ones have been blown for idk how long, and replacing these was very easy and had a HUGH improvement. I would defiantly recommend to anyone in question.
customer_reviews.author: BLAKE

customer_reviews.title: Good quality build and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Was good build quality and definitely much better than the stock tweeters. Voice was clearer in calls too. Easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am more than satisfied with it being wireless and all

customer_reviews.title: it's a great product😀
customer_reviews.text: They sound really loud and clear had 2 buy 2 more for my other car ,, it's a great product😀
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Sound gnarly!! Very impressed. Cant wait to ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound gnarly!! Very impressed. Cant wait to put some real ampage to 'em. Pushing jus off my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Ok, listen up. For the price, the best you can do. I've had a few tweeters and for the price no better.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: what I wanted when i wanted and at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These have AMAZING highs! The only problem I've experienced with both of the pairs of these I've had is a slight fuzzing/ buzzing no matter what I do. But, I highly recommend these tweeters. They find spectacular. Warning: JBL has very slow customer service but good products. If something happens to your speakers I recommend going through amazon not JBL
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Wired up to my Alpine Head unit which only puts out 45w x 4 - yet these speakers blew within days.... installed with the bass blockers included into a cross over, yet still not strong enough to handle 45 watts I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Tony A

customer_reviews.title: First of all, I must say this product is ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I must say this product is TRASH!!!!!! If you have any sense of what quality is, this is not the product you are looking for. The other reviews must be fake. I plugged them in and literally heard almost static. They don't put out volume at all. I'd return them if I hadn't cut out a hole in my mirror panel!!!1
customer_reviews.author: lessie moore

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The highs are insanely high. I would have a headache just driving from work home.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Rorie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tweeters
customer_reviews.text: These tweeters greatly improve the soundstage in my car. I chose these after being thoroughly impressed with the high range on their studio monitors and these have that same great clarity. Not too difficult to install, but this will vary by car. I was able to get the pair into an 8th gen civic in about 1 hour. One small consideration is that the crossovers for these are pretty massive, about 0.75 x 0.75 x 3 inches, much larger than the actual speaker itself. Be prepared to stuff all that circuitry inside your car somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: E. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, clear, loud and not harsh
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tweeters. Used in dash of my 2016 Kia Forte to replace OEM tweeters. Much louder and more clear crisp highs. Have on aftermarket Joying Android head unit 50X4bandbthis is plenty of power. Sound great and not "harsh" what so ever. Nothing but clear highs and treble. Has multiple mounting brackets so you can easily mount anywhere. Has an online/external crossover that's bigger but not bulky and easily hidden. I went with JBL because they never let me down...again this was the case. Exceeded my expectations since there is much pricier options. Very pleased with sound quality and all the mounting options. Can't beat these!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Quality
customer_reviews.text: These tweeters were extremely easy to install (at least in my 2012 Chevy Silverado 1500). I already had A-pillar factory tweeters so I was able to disconnect factory tweeters and directly hook up JBLs. I was even able to use the factory grill/mounts with just a dab of super glue. The sound quality is crisp in clear, even only powered by my factory head unit. The built-in crossover was easy to tuck away and manage. I imagine the sound will even improve more once the JVC head unit I have on order is installed. Great value tweeter!
customer_reviews.author: Sam D.

customer_reviews.title: I can hear what I was missing
customer_reviews.text: I just finished installing a 6-speaker JBL sound system in my 2004 RAV4. It sounds better than I had hoped. The components work very well together although they were not a set. I bought the GTO19T tweeters separately. The value is fantastic. It appears that JBL has discontinued this model so I think I got a discounted price. For $40 you'd be hard pressed to find their equal for sound. They came with several types of mounting hardware but I had to do some customization for my vehicle. The result is very satisfying. This excellent vehicle has a new lease on life!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Narum

customer_reviews.title: I use these to listen to more powerful engines than mine while I drive my car around.
customer_reviews.text: Paired these things up with the GTO8629 and it sounds awesome! My only problem? Hydroplaning through all the wet panties women be throwing at my car :)
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: 2007 Infiniti G35x - Fit with modification but sounds is great.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love these tweeters. They aren't too bright as far as highs, but just perfect. I added them in the pillars of my 3013 GMC Sierra crew cab and it lights up the cab now with highs that I was missing from before. I definitely recommend an amplifier. It sounds 10 times better powered by an external amplifier!
customer_reviews.author: robert dooley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These made a huge difference to the tweeters in my 2011 JK - excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: NYC man

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive alternative sound improvement
customer_reviews.text: great factory replacement 2015 Ram 1500 roof location, low impedance 2.5 allows factory amp to easily supply power make sure you use inline crossovers included in box.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Morrow

customer_reviews.title: sound great in my 2012 jeep wrangler/had to put electrical tape ...
customer_reviews.text: sound great in my 2012 jeep wrangler/had to put electrical tape around them so they stay snug in the tombstone speaker spaces/worked out well
customer_reviews.author: tobar

customer_reviews.title: Loud!
customer_reviews.text: Added these to my jk, in the tombstones. "Upgraded" alpine tweeters were a joke. These are so clear and loud that I only needed to replace them and it is plenty loud now!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tweeters
customer_reviews.text: Bright highs, not harsh at all. Nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: big sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Small speaker but loud, clear and crisp highs. Made a HUGE difference over the stock mediocre "premium" speakers from Honda. Comes with inline high-pass filter. Includes a variety of pieces to offer multiple ways to mount
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound great in my 2012 Silverado Crew Cab. Really made a big difference
customer_reviews.author: M. Denton

customer_reviews.title: awesome jbl!
customer_reviews.text: small tiny for jus about any install --outstanding performance...awesome jbl!

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Can hear the highs and voices very well. Very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: richnero

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great difference in hearing the separation & highs in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Makes a great difference in hearing the separation & highs in the music. I put these in both of my cars.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sounds great. Added the high end that my car was missing. No harshness at all
customer_reviews.author: David Barringer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta respect JBL for this fine product, works very well even at high volumes, does not crack! Very clear and crisp, very happy with the purchase now we'll see how they hold to the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Even sound great with my 4 pioneer speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Laniak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding tweeter, very crisp & clear. Really improved my sound in my 2015 Jeep Wrangler.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good tweeters, but way too harsh for me
customer_reviews.text: These tweeters are super harsh! Yes, they are clear, but definitely not soft or pleasant. If you want good quality without losing your hearing, you have to go with Morel tweeters. I am replacing these JBL's with Morel next week. On the other note: they fit easily in my Honda Accord 2016. Stock tweeter enclosures have to be slightly shaved in order to fit these with provided adapters. Sound quality is generally wonderful, but I just need something more balanced and less sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for replacement of my oem speaker for 14 ram alpine setup. They sound great
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Tweeters!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tweeters, nice addition to any sound system, great highs, using flush mounted on my A-Pillars, they look sweet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Vargas

customer_reviews.title: amazing.. my only issue is i ran them ...
customer_reviews.text: they sound so clear and crisp...amazing..my only issue is i ran them alittle too hard..they start to get scratchy at super high volumes...i had them to a 150rms per channel amp...yes it was true power..along with the jbl mkii c608gti component sets...2 sets and 4 of these tweeters...makes for beautiful reproduction
customer_reviews.author: tylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, very easy installation in my Jeep Wrangler ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, very easy installation in my Jeep Wrangler with the abundance of mounting options provided in the box. Extremely pleased with the all around value.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: JBL GTO19T Premium 0.75-Inch Component Tweeter - Set of 2
product_meta.description: JBL GTO19T Premium 0.75-Inch Component Tweeter - Set of 2
feature_bullets: Soft-dome tweeter features oversized voice coils for greater heat dissipation and higher power handling resulting in smooth, fatigue free highs
Carbon-composite, nonmagnetic baskets maintain their integrity and precision even under the most demanding conditions
Low-impedance, three-ohm speakers compensate for the undersized wires found in many of today's cars, and make the most of every watt your car stereo can deliver

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars242 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
